venue.name: Hanover Theater for the Performing Arts

item.description:
Colin Mochrie & Brad Sherwood
Did you ever watch Whose Line Is It Anyway? I did, and these two guys were hysterical!

Dinner is at 6:30 pm at Ding Ho next door to the theatre. The show starts at 8:00 pm.

I'll be there around 6 pm, so feel free to arrive then if you can.

The popular stars of Whose Line Is It Anyway? present an evening of extraordinary improv comedy. Colin and Brad will take contributions from the audience to create hilarious and original scenes... Just like a live version of ‘Whose Line’!

Ticket prices: $30-$40 (plus taxes and handling fees)

To purchase your ticket, contact the theatre directly for the seat of your choice.
item.name: Laughs at Hanover Theatre with Colin Mochrie & Brad Sherwood
